00024 void CDFProbeSetWriter::WriteHeader()
00025 {
00026         writer->WriteHeader();

00029 void CDFProbeSetWriter::Close()
00030 {
00031         writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00032         delete writer;
00033         writer = 0;
00034 }

00036 void CDFProbeSetWriter::Write(u_int16_t xCoord,
00037                                                                                                                         u_int16_t yCoord,
00038                                                                                                                         u_int32_t atom,
00039                                                                                                                         u_int32_t indexPos,
00040                                                                                                                         int8_t baseProbe,
